short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily view all the page resources for the active tab via the toolbar popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Page resources is an extension that allows you to view and download all the resources for the active tab. 

To work with this addon, please browse a website with content and then open the toolbar popup. All the available resource categories are displayed in the top-left section. Please click each category to see the related resource entries in the right section. For each entry (if clicked) you can see the details at the bottom section within the interface. Moreover, when you hover over each resource entry, three buttons to Open, Copy, and Download the resource appear on the right.

Note: This extension does not work for blank or browser's internal pages.

If you have a feature request or found a bug to report, please fill out the bug report form on the addon's homepage (https://mybrowseraddon.com/page-resources.html).
